name: RATillery (Full Version)
description:
RATillery is an artillery game inspired by GORILLA.BAS, but starring fireball-throwing rats fighting for a good meal in a warehouse environment.

Logistic problem! Piles of crates of fresh supplies intended for a classy French restaurant end up in the warehouse where you, skinny rat, live.

As you set up to have the meal of your life, a rat from another clan comes to dispute the new arrival.

Crush him into ratatouille and move to table!

This is a vastly improved version of the original freeware DOS game!

Specifications:

  • NEW: VGA 256 color suport (320x200). 
  • NEW: VGA 16 color support (640x480)
  • CGA 4 color support (320x200)
  • Tandy 16 color support (320x200). NEW: Also works on PCjr.
  • NEW: AdLib, OPL2LPT and Tandy (PSG) sound
  • PC-Speaker sound
  • NEW: In-game timer (those who think too much loose their turn!)
  • NEW: Training mode (get better through challenges)
  • NEW: Much stronger AI adversary (for playing alone)

A boxed version also available from Côté Gamers, check it out!
